Module com.ning.breakout
Package com.ning.breakout.view.graphics

Class ClayBrick

java.lang.Object
com.ning.breakout.view.graphics.Brick
com.ning.breakout.view.graphics.ClayBrick
public class ClayBrick extends Brick
ClayBrick is the concrete class extends from the abstract class Brick, with full strength of 1.
Author:
Ning ZHU - modified

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class com.ning.breakout.view.graphics.Brick

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ClayBrick(BrickModel model, javafx.scene.Group group)
    The Class constructor sets the model and the view container of the clay brick, binds the layout of the view of the clay brick with the model, adds the view to the container, and specifies the number of effective impacts the clay brick can withstand in total by calling the constructor of super class.
